effect.scarlet-violet: This Pokémon cannot be confused. If a Pokémon is confused and acquires this ability, its confusion will immediately be healed.
effect.the-teal-mask: This Pokémon cannot be confused. If a Pokémon is confused and acquires this ability, its confusion will immediately be healed.
effect.the-indigo-disk: This Pokémon cannot be confused. If a Pokémon is confused and acquires this ability, its confusion will immediately be healed.

flavor_text.scarlet-violet: The Pokémon sticks to its own tempo, preventing it from becoming confused or being affected by Intimidate.
